👀 **ABOUT** 
**BitDAO** is a collective of builders and stakeholders enabling mutually beneficial web3 ecosystems of people, products, and public goods. We utilize our treasury of billions in assets to grow an ecosystem of Autonomous Entities (AEs) with a shared vision for the future — driving the development of web3 tools and technologies across industries including arts, education, media, finance, gaming, and technology — and providing a return to the treasury.

Hi team!

🔥 ** What we’ve built ?** A dApp that uses Chainlink oracle to provide escrow service to financial institutions, to increase the amount of credit they can lend in** fiat local currency **to unbanked people from LatAm, without taking extra risk. The person without credit scoring sets up a warranty in **stablecoin** and the institution grants them a credit card /credit for the same amount or more, according to their business rules. 

🌐  **Where? **We’ve developed this project on EVM-compatible blockchains and love to developed on **Mantle. Would love some feedback 🙂 **

🕯️ **Why?** This helps the **65% unbanked population of LatAm ** and contributes the overall economic growth of the region. After this first step, people demonstrate the ability to pay in local currency their debts and **start building their credit scoring** that will allow them to access better options in the future. 

🚀 **What’s next?** We are working in the unification of different wallets using zero-knowledge proofs and verifiable credentials to create a n**ew decentralized digital identity**, cross-lender, cross-blockchain, and cross-scoring protocols unifying them. 

Check it out:  https://ethglobal.com/showcase/xscrow-j571i

Cheers! Xscrow team 🙂

Builders of all skill levels are welcome to join social & technical bounties!

We've opened two Missions for Mantle hackers at #ETHTokyo to take on during & after the event
1. Write a Twitter Thread about building on Mantle at ETHTokyo - 500 <:BIT:974359325126565918> 
2. Build a massive number of on-chain transactions - 1000 <:BIT:974359325126565918> 

We're eager to build alongside our community! Drop a message in this channel if you have an idea for this program or other developer community activities and events. 

🫡 Check out the full info and add your submissions here:

gm i have an issue with deployment on mantle. im using the same config and settings as i have used a few weeks ago but now i'm getting errors. other networks work fine. anyone who can help
I get: ProviderError: too many arguments, want at most 1
hi what exactly are your trying?
possible to give a little context?
i want to deploy my contract on the mantle network
okay
please send ss of the current error
also hardhat config file

the network seems to be fine 

this might be an issue related to the code - are you by any change trying to deploy multiple instances of contracts together?
also pls make sure that your wallet has a few bits for gas

I have 500MNT in the wallet. I am just deploying a single contract, and it works on other networks. So unsure what is the issue. 
I do have a constructor with 3 args for the deploy, could this cause issues on Mantle?
just checked on my end - mainnet testnet both are working

can you try one thing? 

try chaning the rpc to mainnet and send me your mainnet wallet address - will send you some MNT for deployment.
okay
0x388615CDF39FE5934Ac05AcFf2bbB86DB933CcB7
sent you 5 MNT on mainnet
pls change your hardhat config
and try redeploying
unfortunatly i get the same error still
gotcha
would the same deploy on other networks?

are you hacking irl in paris by anychance? our team folks should be able to look at your code in a better way 

one alterntive you can try is try to change the private_key and creating another instance and calling that in hardhat config - 
i see PRIVATE_KEY - you can use that for other networks 

for others use the same but for mantle use another variable -PRIV_KEY
I can drop by your booth, are you guys there?
The same deploy does work on multiple other networks. That's why I'm confused
defo recommend - LibeEVM and Sydney should be - pls check once
Mantle Booth should be there
k will head down

Your colleague from the booth took my phone and wrote the message to you 😂
Afterwards I realized we are already talking
Who?
I think Sydney
was there another person present at the booth by any chance? Sorry to go back and forth
cause solving the issue online without exchanging files here and there wouldn't be possible
are you hacking irl in paris by
yes we solved the issue, i had to put `, { gasLimit: 1000000}` in the ethers deployment call and now it's deployed.
thanks for the help! 🔥

thanks

email used during submission?
i can get back to you

  Member: Tomohiko Araki
  Email:  arakitomohiko@gmail.com
   Discord: rtree

Is this sufficient?
yes, i’ve forwarded the info to the team let me get back to you once i have a response
Thank you so much.

<@329218663922008066> where exactly and how exactly did the fix work? possible to share screenshots 

same error is being thrown for multiple folks

Yes sure thing. In the deployment script we had to pass an extra parameter `{ gasLimit: 10000000}`
This is the line in our deployment contract including the fix:
`  const game = await ethers.deployContract("Game", ["0x9c3C9283D3e44854697Cd22D3Faa240Cfb032889", 200, "0xAfAE2dD69F115ec26DFbE2fa5a8642D94D7Cd37E"], { gasLimit: 10000000});`
And also we are curious to know why we were not part of the pool prize. Could you DM me with the details? Teamname Geoquete
